definitions.title: n.m. eipth.
definitions.body: of Assyrian king (prop., si vera 1., vb. = let him contend, or (one who) contends);—only ´[[מֶלֶח י]]: Ho 5:18, Ho 10:6, i.e. TP. III; WMM:ZAW xvii (1897), 335 prop. [[מַלְכִּי רַב]] ([[י]]- old nom. termin.) = As. šarru rabbu; Che:Expos., Nov. 1807, 864 [[מלך רב]]; Che:Ency. Bib. JAREB conj. [[מלך ערבי]], Arabian king; cf., further, Comm., Schr:COT, ad loc. JA Selbie:Hastings DB, JAREB and reff.
